snippet.title: Probe Final Steam Update Trailer
snippet.description:
The final steam update for Probe is here! Now with a scoring system and leaderboards! See if you can climb the ranks and get top scores on each level or for an overall score in the whole game.

Get Probe on steam here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275980/Probe/
Don't forget to review! Every bit of feedback helps me make my games better :)

Any future updates will be bug fixes and possibly some new levels. Follow me on twitter for updates or new game announcements: https://twitter.com/N8Bit_Games
